quest.085B40A50A0D4244.title: &dMystical Agriculture
quest.085B40A50A0D4244.quest_desc1: &dMystical Agriculture&r allows you to create plants of pretty much every resource, including mobs. If you are the farming type and never want to worry about resources again, Mystical Ag is the way to go.
quest.085B40A50A0D4244.quest_desc3: To start your adventure, you'll need to collect &aInferium Essence&r. This drops from mobs when killed, or from sluicing gravel with a gold or diamond sieve.
quest.085B40A50A0D4244.quest_desc5: Once you have at least 8, you can make your first &aInferium Seed&r to start growing it!
chapter.7ECA39E2497C35D1.title: Mystical Agriculture
quest.7695C03E7A574D93.title: &bProsperity Shards&r
quest.7695C03E7A574D93.quest_desc1: &bProsperity Shards&r are mined from Prosperity ore. You'll need a lot of this to make the different seeds in Mystical Ag. It's also used in making most of the tools and armor.
quest.7695C03E7A574D93.quest_desc3: One of the most important uses is to make the &eInfusion Crystal&r. This Crystal will upgrade 4 essences into the next tier, starting with Inferium.
quest.7695C03E7A574D93.quest_desc5: Eventually, you can make a Crystal that never breaks, but it's probably a good idea to make a few of these.
quest.5574D291E6E69013.title: &2Prudentium Essence
quest.68A9B5BD25E86D75.title: &cTertium Essence&r
quest.2E56DB4CBFE2F37C.title: &bImperium Essence&r
quest.2AE9ADF578ABEA11.title: &dSupremium Essence&r
quest.737E1886B44C3D8B.title: &fCrafting Gear &aUpgrades
quest.737E1886B44C3D8B.quest_desc1: &bMystical Agriculture's&r tools and armor can be upgraded using &dAugments&r in the &aTinkering Table&r.
quest.737E1886B44C3D8B.quest_desc3: These augments have specific tiers, and will only upgrade items that are the same tier or higher. Each piece of gear has a specific amount of augment slots as well, so keep that in mind!
quest.5E04779BC1EB52E9.title: &bElemental &fSeeds
quest.5E04779BC1EB52E9.quest_desc1: The &bElemental Seeds&r are used to make some of the basic elements, like providing recipes for Water and Lava buckets.
quest.5E04779BC1EB52E9.quest_desc3: These are also used to make the strongest tier of essence, &6Awakened Supremium Essence&r.
task.16E364F01286BDB3.title: &bElemental &fSeeds
quest.3490E1E29396D066.title: &aTier 1 &fSeeds
task.2499252075BAB96E.title: &aTier 1 &fSeeds
quest.736EF0026F658DA7.title: &2Tier 2 &fSeeds
task.7BB3EBCE8739E890.title: &2Tier 2 &fSeeds
quest.33AC3264C0AE8FF1.title: &fGrowing &bMobs
quest.33AC3264C0AE8FF1.quest_desc1: If you're looking to grow &bMob Seeds&r to convert into their loot, you'll need a few things to get started.
quest.33AC3264C0AE8FF1.quest_desc3: The simplest way to do this is by making &eEmpty Soul Jars&r, and then filling them inside a &6Soul Extractor&r. This works by placing in something the mob might drop to extract the mob essence into the Soul Jar. Check JEI for recipes!
quest.33AC3264C0AE8FF1.quest_desc5: You can also use the &aSoulium Dagger&r to kill mobs to fill the &eSoul Jars&r in your inventory.
quest.0D92EFDB73114B0C.title: &2Tier 2 &fMob Seeds
quest.0D92EFDB73114B0C.quest_desc1: With &2Prudentium&r, you now have access to make &bMob Seeds&r.
quest.0D92EFDB73114B0C.quest_desc3: Unlike most of the regular seeds, these require a &2Soulium Seed Base&r to create, as well as filled &aSoul Jars&r of the desired mob essence.
task.44471E3598AA381B.title: &2Tier 2 &fMob Seeds
quest.45F8CB4497591B10.title: &cTier 3 &fMob Seeds
task.446D5F05F0D41082.title: &cTier 3 &fMob Seeds
quest.7AEC335123E441BA.title: &cTier 3 &fSeeds
task.42FAF622DDC2AEA0.title: &cTier 3 &fSeeds
quest.7C4F7E36320797C5.title: &bTier 4 &fMob Seeds
task.358A34AEEA9FD574.title: &bTier 4 &fMob Seeds
quest.580DDEAC95562B05.title: &bTier 4 &fSeeds
task.351368ACA09D8C22.title: &bTier 4 &fSeeds
quest.60EBD67EDCE669DD.title: &dTier 5 &fSeeds
task.040406F0404C8971.title: &dTier 5 &fSeeds
quest.0D79C07499BF6E95.title: &fAwakening Altar
quest.0D79C07499BF6E95.quest_desc1: To create &6Awakened Supremium Essence&r, we'll need to create a new altar for the Awakening.
quest.0D79C07499BF6E95.quest_desc3: Just like the &aInfusion Altar&r, place down the &6Awakening Altar&r first to show a guide on where to place the pedestals and vessels. To create the recipe, the altar will also need a redstone signal.
quest.0D79C07499BF6E95.quest_desc5: Items for the recipe will be placed directly on the &6Awakening Pedestals&r. For the &6Essence Vessels&r, you'll need to place in one of each of the &bElemental Essences&r.
quest.7123022757E50A70.title: &5Insanium Essence&r
quest.7123022757E50A70.quest_desc1: This is the max tier essence for seed crafting. Seeds crafted using &5Insanium&r require a &6Crux&r to be able to grow. These are placed directly below the farmland.
quest.458B3C345767E296.title: &5Nether Star Seeds
quest.2AF9753B396F7625.title: &dMaster Infusion Crystal
quest.2AF9753B396F7625.quest_desc1: Once you've collected at least 4 &dSupremium Essence&r, you can now craft the &6Master Infusion Crystal&r.
quest.2AF9753B396F7625.quest_desc3: It's an Infusion Crystal that never breaks!
quest.603BAFEF92DA275E.title: &aInferium &fArmor
quest.603BAFEF92DA275E.quest_desc1: With the help of &bProsperity Ingots&r and &bGemstones&r, we can upgrade Diamond armor to be even better.
quest.603BAFEF92DA275E.quest_desc3: Armor from this mod can be upgraded using the &aTinkering Table&r using &dAugments&r.
task.0C41CFCD491848EC.title: &aInferium &fArmor
quest.13448A305B57016A.quest_desc1: If you're looking to upgrade your gear, &aInferium Gear&r is better than Diamond! There are also great new tools like &eScythes&r and &bSickles&r that provide an AoE harvesting effect!
quest.13448A305B57016A.quest_desc3: These tools can also be upgrading using &dAugments&r in a Tinkering Table.
task.48BB22683A4C50AD.title: &aInferium &fGear
quest.26EA309139C7C27E.title: &fThe &aFurnace
quest.26EA309139C7C27E.quest_desc1: You want a faster furnace? Mystical Ag. has you covered.
quest.26EA309139C7C27E.quest_desc3: The &bFurnace&r uses power to smelt items, and comes with a built in &agenerator&r using burnable items like coal or wood.
quest.26EA309139C7C27E.quest_desc5: Just like other machines from the mod, the &bFurnace&r can also be upgraded using &aMachine Upgrades&r to increase the overall speed of the machine, fuel storage, and more.
quest.208A53545D649C8D.title: &aMachine Upgrades&r
quest.208A53545D649C8D.quest_desc1: Machines from this mod can be upgraded using &aMachine Upgrades&r!
quest.208A53545D649C8D.quest_desc3: Each tier increases the stats of the machine, and can be seen in the tooltip by holding shift while hovering the upgrade.
quest.3429ADCC43607897.title: &fReprocessing &2Extra Seeds
quest.3429ADCC43607897.quest_desc1: Have a problem with getting too many extra seeds? In the South, we call that a blessing. I think.
quest.3429ADCC43607897.quest_desc3: Run those extra seeds through a &aSeed Reprocessor&r to break them down into more essence!
quest.140258D21BFEA3EB.title: &aAutomatic Harvesting
quest.140258D21BFEA3EB.quest_desc1: The &aHarvester&r does exactly what it sounds like.
quest.140258D21BFEA3EB.quest_desc3: Depending on the tier of upgrade, this machine will harvest your crops for you automatically when given power. Just like the furnace, it can be given burnable items like coal to power it as well!
quest.140258D21BFEA3EB.quest_desc5: It harvests any crop it is facing towards on the same Y level.
quest.0BB08BDA4100A686.title: &2Prudentium &fGear

quest.34C8F98F68B133B5.title: &bImperium &fGear

quest.59090638A27CEC29.title: &dSupremium &fArmor
task.228E18B91C6F4249.title: &dSupremium &fArmor
quest.342F1C3D3A821B2B.title: &dSupremium &fGear
task.0D0541DC3C0F1FDC.title: &dSupremium &fGear
quest.6E9BCC46F9963413.title: &dSupremium &fWatering Can
quest.550BD484CE96EAB1.title: &dSupremium &fMachine Upgrade
quest.0C259021A652EFCE.title: &aSpeeding Up Farms &fwith Blocks!
quest.0C259021A652EFCE.quest_desc1: While there are plenty of other ways to speed up crop growth from other mods, Mystical Agriculture comes with two ways to speed things up, the first one being Growth Accelerators.
quest.0C259021A652EFCE.quest_desc3: &aGrowth Accelerators&r work by increasing the crop speed of the plant at the top of the block. These stack up to a certain range depending on the tier. Higher tiers do not increase the growth speed, but instead allow for using more blocks because of the longer range.
quest.0C259021A652EFCE.quest_desc5: For example, having 18 Prudentium Growth Accelerators provides the same growth speed as using 9 Inferium GAs and 9 Prudentium GAs in a single tower.
task.27FFF0492348277F.title: &dGrowth Accelerators
quest.2EBDE5767588B43C.title: &6Cognizant Dust&r
quest.2EBDE5767588B43C.quest_desc1: To create &6Awakened Supremium&r, we'll need a dust that only drops from the &5Ender Dragon&r or the &5Wither&r.
quest.2EBDE5767588B43C.quest_desc3: This is called &6Cognizant Dust&r, and will only drop when they are slain with a Mystical Agriculture weapon enchanted with &dMystical Enlightenment&r.
quest.7C9CABB75B422A4A.title: &6Awakened Essence&r
quest.7C9CABB75B422A4A.quest_desc1: Using the &6Awakening Altar&r, you can combine &6Cognizant Dusts&r with the &bElements&r to Awaken your Supremium Essence!
quest.7C9CABB75B422A4A.quest_desc3: This is the Awakened Tier of essence, and creates some of the most powerful tools and armor in the game. Awakened Gear provides more augment slots!
quest.1CFEC4265CAAA0D8.title: &aInferium &fWatering Can
quest.1CFEC4265CAAA0D8.quest_desc1: &bWatering Cans&r are pretty simple. Fill it with water first by sneak using it on water, then hold right click to use it over an area. You can also sneak use it while looking into the air to use it automatically when held.
quest.1CFEC4265CAAA0D8.quest_desc3: The higher the tier, the more area that it covers. Usually these are automated by placing them in auto-clickers.
quest.42E45B47360C59F3.title: &bUnderstanding &2Essence Farmland
quest.42E45B47360C59F3.quest_desc1: &2Essence Farmland&r can be created by using any tier of Inferium Essence on a piece of Farmland. These can also be crafted.
quest.42E45B47360C59F3.quest_desc3: These types of farmland increase the output of &aInferium Essence&r when harvested. Higher tier farmlands only increase the amount of Inferium Essence when harvested.
task.2CA99A333EDFB6FC.title: &aEssence Farmlands
quest.06635954BF3D49AE.title: &6Awakened Supremium &fWatering Can
quest.4A8D12E484DF2A81.title: &6Awakened Supremium &fMachine Upgrade
quest.47916D9BDCC5E6C4.title: &6Awakened Supremium &fGear
task.76CF3F2C875B9EAF.title: &6Awakened Supremium &fGear
quest.454B2187BD8B939F.title: &6Awakened Supremium &fArmor
task.3F8CD319BDBC509E.title: &6Awakened Supremium &fArmor
quest.259818648228F2E9.title: &2Charged Prosperity Seeds
quest.259818648228F2E9.quest_desc1: In order to craft &2Tier 2&r seeds, you will need to have made an &aAtomic Reconstructor&r from &6Actually Additions&r.
quest.259818648228F2E9.quest_desc3: To charge your &aProsperity Seed&r, simply throw it in the laser coming out of a powered &aAtomic Reconstructor&r.
quest.0ACF5DAF571848F5.title: &cCharged Voidflame Seed
